nodes.body: {ðŸŽ® releases} [Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland](https://g.co/kgs/BAZdXKD) with music by [Fat Bard](https://www.fatbard.com/) has released with some [limited edition physical stuff](https://limitedrungames.com/collections/rugrats-adventures-in-gameland)!

{ðŸ’²jobs} An amateur board game designer is looking for help with a title, logo, and box art for their Monopoly-inspired American History Educational Board Game. Ideally someone with design experience in the St Louis Area. Contact [David@MarketManagement.biz](mailto:David@MarketManagement.biz) if you are interested!
{ðŸ—£ talks} Pixelles is looking for Moms in Gaming who want to give a micro-talk for their upcoming event! More details [here!](https://bsky.app/profile/pixellesmtl.bsky.social/post/3korptri4z32h)

{!header} It has been awhile since the last Roundup. I (Tim) have been busy with a new job that keeps me from being able to spend as much time looking for news and things for this... If anyone is able to step in and help contribute, please do! It's SUPER easy to add new entries to upcoming Roundups! Just add a new comment to the current Open [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/AxolStudio/STLGameDevRoundUp/issues) with the 'next roundup' label! 
[Let me know](mailto:tim@axolstudio.com) if you have any questions!
{ðŸŽº music} Check out this [Jam Session](https://twitter.com/zach_massacre/status/1773417108593885645) with Zach from Fat Bard!

{ðŸ“° articles} Here's an [interview with the creator of Rollercoaster Tycoon, Chris Sawyer](https://medium.com/atari-club/interview-with-rollercoaster-tycoons-creator-chris-sawyer-684a0efb0f13), for the game's 25th anniversary!

{ðŸŽ® releases} [Serafina's Saga: Awakened is now available on Epic store!](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/serafinas-saga-awakened-921f2a) Don't miss this otome-style visual novel by Woodsy Studio!
